titles: A Most notaple [sic] example of an ungracious son, who in the pride of his heart denyed his own father, and how God for his offence turned his meat into loathsome toads. To the tune of, Lord Darby.
publisher: Printed for F Coles, T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson.,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
